Attacks.Name: Peck
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, Spearow gains power equal to the damage dealt. Wild: The target gains the Bleed special condition.

Attacks.Name: Fury Attack
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled, Spearow may make an additional Fury Attack without paying the cost. The additional attack must target the original character.

Superpowers.Name: Keen Eye
Superpowers.Effect: Spearow may reroll one die in its attack rolls when attacking a character with the Stealth ability.

Superpowers.Name: Quick Escape
Superpowers.Effect: Spearow may immediately advance S. This superpower can be used only once per turn.

Attacks.Name: Wing Attack
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled, Spearow may push the target character S before damage is dealt.

Superpowers.Name: Feisty Fighter
Superpowers.Effect: When Spearow is attacked, if no damage is dealt, Spearow gains 1 power.

Superpowers.Name: Evolution
Superpowers.Effect: Replace this character with a Fearow character of the same injured status. The new character begins with damage equal to the damage on this character and power equal to the power on this character.
